original_text:
Jin Chan’s Pond of Riches
Nel mondo delle slot machine sono diversi i temi che ricorrono in maniera più o meno frequente e quello legato al mondo e alla cultura asiatica, cinese in particolare, è dopo l’Antico Egitto uno dei più sfruttati in assoluto.
Detto questo, sebbene non spicchi per originalità, il modo in cui in Jin Chan’s Pond of Riches è sviluppato il tema della cultura asiatica è molto interessante e ben costruito.
Il protagonista di Jin Chan’s Pond of Riches è un ranocchio molto particolare, chiamato appunto Jin Chan, che nella cultura cinese rappresenta un Feng Chui, ossia un simbolo di fortuna e prosperità, molto noto!
Il vero punto di forza di questa slot machine prodotta dalla software house Thunderkick non è però il tema, bensì la grafica: ci troviamo infatti davanti a un compartimento grafico davvero d’eccellenza! Ve ne potrete rendere conto anche solo accedendo all schermata iniziale di Jin Chan’s Pond of Riches in cui troverete uno stagno rappresentato in maniera molto realistica , in mezzo al quale sorge una tradizionale pagoda.
I rulli sembrano anch’essi immersi nello stagno, sono contornati da una ricca cornice che raffigura vari animali e strutturati come se la griglia fosse essa stessa un’antica pagoda.
Se cercate un gioco veramente bello graficamente, Jin Chan’s Pond of Riches potrebbe essere proprio quello che fa per voi!
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine
Jin Chan’s Pond of Riches ha una griglia di gioco tradizionale, composta da cinque rulli, tre righe e quindici linee di pagamento. Il range di scommessa è molto ampio: potrete infatti effettuare delle puntate a partire da soli 10 centesimi fino ad arrivare a un massimo di 100 € a giro.
Questa slot di casa Thunderkick è caratterizzata da una volatilità molto alta, che, unita a un ritorno teorico al giocatore davvero basso (94,27 %), potrebbe richiedere molta pazienza, prima che possiate mettervi in tasca dei bei premi.
Se non avete intenzione però di spendere del denaro vero, potrete tranquillamente giocare a Jin Chan’s Pond of Riches in maniera del tutto gratuita e senza necessità di registrazione grazie alla disponibilità della versione demo!
Simboli e funzionalità di Jin Chan’s Pond of Riches
A una grafica davvero molto bella in Jin Chan’s Pond of Riches si associa un gameplay altrettanto interessante e ben congegnato.
I simboli che trovate sui rulli sono i reali, dal 9 all’Asso, più alcuni simboli caratteristici della cultura cinese, quali la tartaruga, l’airone, la carpa e la rana.
La luna piena è il simbolo Wild con funzione di jolly, mentre lo Scatter, rappresentato da Jin Chan con in bocca una moneta d’oro, regala dagli 8 ai 16 giri gratuiti quando compare sui rulli per almeno tre volte!
Avrete poi la possibilità di usufruire di una funzionalità Sticky Respins, che vi farà vincere tanti ulteriori giri gratuiti e ricchi premi!

raw_translation.response:
Jin Chan's Pond of Riches

In the world of slot machines, there are various themes that recur more or less frequently, and the one related to the Asian world and culture, in particular China, is one of the most exploited absolutely after Ancient Egypt.
Having said that, although it may not stand out for originality, the way in which the Asian culture theme is developed in Jin Chan's Pond of Riches is very interesting and well-constructed.

The protagonist of Jin Chan's Pond of Riches is a very particular frog, called Jin Chan, which in Chinese culture represents a Feng Chui, that is a symbol of luck and prosperity, very well known!

However, the real strength of this slot machine produced by the software house Thunderkick is not the theme, but the graphics: we are in fact faced with a really excellent graphic compartment! You can realize this even just by accessing the initial screen of Jin Chan's Pond of Riches where you will find a pond represented in a very realistic way, in the middle of which a traditional pagoda rises.

The reels also seem immersed in the pond, are surrounded by a rich frame depicting various animals and structured as if the grid itself were an ancient pagoda.
If you are looking for a really beautiful game graphically, Jin Chan's Pond of Riches could be just right for you!

Main features of the slot machine

Jin Chan's Pond of Riches has a traditional game grid, consisting of five reels, three rows, and fifteen pay lines. The range of bets is very wide: you can in fact place bets starting from just 10 cents up to a maximum of 100 € per spin.

This Thunderkick slot is characterized by a very high volatility, which, combined with a very low theoretical return to the player (94.27%), could require a lot of patience before you can pocket some nice prizes. However, if you do not intend to spend real money, you can comfortably play Jin Chan's Pond of Riches for free and without registration thanks to the availability of the demo version!

Symbols and features of Jin Chan's Pond of Riches

In Jin Chan's Pond of Riches, a really beautiful graphics is associated with an equally interesting and well-conceived gameplay.

The symbols you find on the reels are the royal cards, from 9 to Ace, plus some symbols characteristic of Chinese culture, such as the turtle, the heron, the carp, and the frog.

The full moon is the Wild symbol with a wild card function, while the Scatter, represented by Jin Chan with a gold coin in his mouth, awards 8 to 16 free spins when it appears on the reels at least three times!

You will then have the opportunity to take advantage of a Sticky Respins feature, which will give you many additional free spins and rich prizes!

message.content:
Jin Chan’s Pond of Riches

In the world of slot machines, Asian culture, particularly Chinese, is one of the most exploited themes after Ancient Egypt. Although not particularly original, the way in which Jin Chan’s Pond of Riches develops the theme of Asian culture is very interesting and well-crafted.

The protagonist of the game, Jin Chan, is a very special frog that represents a Feng Chui, a symbol of luck and prosperity, in Chinese culture. But the main strength of this slot machine produced by Thunderkick is not the theme, but the graphics: the graphics are superb! The pond in which the game is set is represented very realistically, with a traditional pagoda in the center.

The reels appear to be immersed in the pond and are surrounded by a rich frame depicting various animals and structured as if the grid itself were an ancient pagoda. If you are looking for a visually stunning game, Jin Chan’s Pond of Riches could be just what you need!

Main features of the slot machine
Jin Chan’s Pond of Riches has a traditional playing grid, consisting of five reels, three rows, and fifteen paylines. The betting range is very wide: you can bet starting from just 10 cents up to a maximum of 100€ per spin.

This Thunderkick slot machine is characterized by very high volatility, which, coupled with a very low theoretical return to player (94.27%), could require a lot of patience before you can pocket some nice prizes. However, if you are not willing to spend real money, you can play Jin Chan’s Pond of Riches for free and without registration thanks to the availability of the demo version!

Symbols and features of Jin Chan’s Pond of Riches
In addition to its beautiful graphics, Jin Chan’s Pond of Riches has an equally interesting and well-conceived gameplay. The symbols on the reels are the royal cards, from 9 to Ace, plus some symbols characteristic of Chinese culture, such as the turtle, heron, carp, and frog.

The full moon is the Wild symbol with the function of a wild card, while the Scatter, represented by Jin Chan with a gold coin in his mouth, gives out 8 to 16 free spins when it appears on the reels at least three times!

You will also have the opportunity to take advantage of a Sticky Respins feature that will earn you many additional free spins and rich prizes! Overall, Jin Chan’s Pond of Riches is a visually stunning game with exciting features that will keep experienced gamblers entertained for hours.

Review: Jin Chan's Pond of Riches

In the world of slot machines, there are various themes that recur more or less frequently, and the one related to the Asian world and culture, in particular China, is one of the most exploited absolutely after Ancient Egypt.
Having said that, although it may not stand out for originality, the way in which the Asian culture theme is developed in Jin Chan's Pond of Riches is very interesting and well-constructed.

The protagonist of Jin Chan's Pond of Riches is a very particular frog, called Jin Chan, which in Chinese culture represents a Feng Chui, that is a symbol of luck and prosperity, very well known!

However, the real strength of this slot machine produced by the software house Thunderkick is not the theme, but the graphics: we are in fact faced with a really excellent graphic compartment! You can realize this even just by accessing the initial screen of Jin Chan's Pond of Riches where you will find a pond represented in a very realistic way, in the middle of which a traditional pagoda rises.

The reels also seem immersed in the pond, are surrounded by a rich frame depicting various animals and structured as if the grid itself were an ancient pagoda.
If you are looking for a really beautiful game graphically, Jin Chan's Pond of Riches could be just right for you!

Main features of the slot machine

Jin Chan's Pond of Riches has a traditional game grid, consisting of five reels, three rows, and fifteen pay lines. The range of bets is very wide: you can in fact place bets starting from just 10 cents up to a maximum of 100 € per spin.

This Thunderkick slot is characterized by a very high volatility, which, combined with a very low theoretical return to the player (94.27%), could require a lot of patience before you can pocket some nice prizes. However, if you do not intend to spend real money, you can comfortably play Jin Chan's Pond of Riches for free and without registration thanks to the availability of the demo version!

Symbols and features of Jin Chan's Pond of Riches

In Jin Chan's Pond of Riches, a really beautiful graphics is associated with an equally interesting and well-conceived gameplay.

The symbols you find on the reels are the royal cards, from 9 to Ace, plus some symbols characteristic of Chinese culture, such as the turtle, the heron, the carp, and the frog.

The full moon is the Wild symbol with a wild card function, while the Scatter, represented by Jin Chan with a gold coin in his mouth, awards 8 to 16 free spins when it appears on the reels at least three times!

You will then have the opportunity to take advantage of a Sticky Respins feature, which will give you many additional free spins and rich prizes!
